name: Rune Fighter
description:
This is a student project based on the Match 3 styled games.

The players goal is to kill waves of monsters to try and get the highest score possible.

Player One Keyboard Controls -

WASD Keys to Navigate the selector.

E Key to select on object or swap an adjacent pieces.

Q Key to activate a match of 4 or more.

Escape to quit the game

Player Two Keyboard Controls -

Directional Keys to Navigate the selector.

N Key to select on object or swap an adjacent pieces.

M Key to activate a match of 4 or more.

Escape to quit the game

Controller Controls -

Left Analog Stick to Navigate the selector.

A Key to select on object or swap an adjacent pieces.

B Key to activate a match of 4 or more.

Start to quit the game
